data.name: Rise of Insanity - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Rise of Insanity Official Soundtrack composed by Wojciech "Boutcher" Śliwa is a music way of telling a story about dr Dowell's journey through the human mind, which is slowly going to insane. In his debut soundtrack Boutcher wanted to show two faces of this story - a tragedy of a man, who lost his wife and child in unknown circumstances and a misery of a family, which can't handle with illness of the loved person.

In final song Iwona Śliwa - Boutcher's wife - plays the role of Steven's wife and tells this sad story from a suffering wife point of view.

Track list:

1. Main theme
2. Welcome home
3. Stare
4. Red wine bottle
5. Crying outside part 1
6. Crying outside part 2
7. All gone
8. Calling (ft. Iwona Śliwa)
9. Lost toys
10. It's comming
11. It's here
12. Into the gloom
13. Snow white walls part 1
14. Snow white walls part 2
15. Rusted bars
16. Guilty
17. Your Light (ft. Iwona Śliwa)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: PC - Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: PC - Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600
  • Graphics: GTX 560
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
